title: Man with White Cane
description: A man using a white cane as a mobility aid, presumably due to them being blind or visually impaired.
apple_vendor_description: The man with white cane emoji on Apple devices is a thoughtful and dignified portrayal, featuring a man with medium skin tone using a white cane to navigate. Apple's design language imbues the figure with smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, creating a sense of gentle movement and clear visibility. Realistic lighting adds a subtle dimensionality to his form, emphasizing his independence and resilience. This emoji serves to represent individuals who are blind or visually impaired, promoting awareness and inclusivity in digital communication.
